name: Weekend Day Centre for Dementia Care
tagline: An informal social environment for people with dementia and their carers.
body:
The Weekend Day Centre provide an informal weekend and bank holiday care facility for people with a formal diagnosis of dementia and their carers within the Stockport borough, including Marple.

We are open Friday through to Tuesday and bank holiday throughout the year (except Christmas Day). The Centre provides day care for up to 26 clients.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
